Author: lilmisssuccubus
Text: You can always say you have an allergy!

Author: rotting_the_crown
Text: Ugh that sucks that it’s a vegetarian chef (I’m assuming you’re vegetarian? Maybe not) but I’m vegan and sometimes people will make things just for me (kind of).  Like “I brought these muffins in and they’re vegan so you can have them!” So I feel this huge obligation to have some, you can’t say no to something that was made specifically for you and other people might think is gross 😩
